title: Linux at Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux file system, manage files and directories, and understand permissions through practical examples.

meta.title: Linux at Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux file system, manage files and directories, and understand permissions through practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, at command, file management, permissions, process management

steps.title: Explore the Linux File System Hierarchy

verify.name: Verify the contents of the root directory
verify.hint: Make sure the root directory contains at least 20 subdirectories as shown in the example output.

steps.title: Manage Files and Directories with Essential Commands

verify.name: Verify file and directory management
verify.hint: Make sure the my_directory directory has been removed and no files (my_file.txt, my_copied_file.txt, my_moved_file.txt) exist in the project directory.

verify.name: Verify file and directory permissions
verify.hint: Make sure the my_file.txt file has permissions of -rwxr-xr- and the my_directory directory has permissions of drwxr-xr-x.
